pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access to the Hebrew, Greek, and English Version of the Bible // Access to the Greek New Testament (27 books) and the Old Testament (39 books) and allow users to do textual analysis on the data. The New and Old Testament have been provided in their original languages, Greek and Hebrew, respectively. Additionally, the Revised American Standard Bible is also provided for users who'd rather use a wordforword modern English translation.
